jurisdiction.notes: Zoning jurisdiction within the City of Miami, not Miami-Dade County.

zoning.notes: Miami 21 zoning code - Urban Core Transect

wall_signs_allowed.source_quote: Wall signs are a permitted sign type in urban Transects (T5, T6, D, C)

maximum_sf_allowed.source_quote: Maximum sign area varies by Transect and frontage
maximum_sf_allowed.notes: Exact calculation depends on building frontage length

illumination_restrictions.value: No illuminated sign is allowed within 100 feet of residential Transects.
illumination_restrictions.source_quote: No illuminated sign is allowed within 100 feet of any T1, T3, T4‑R, T5‑R, or T6‑R property.
illumination_restrictions.notes: General illumination restrictions are prescribed in Article 10.

can_project_above_roofline.source_quote: Attached parallel to the wall (not projecting beyond allowed projection limits).

freestanding_signs_allowed.source_quote: Monument signs are permitted in specific Transects

max_height.source_quote: Maximum height for monument signs: 7 feet
max_height.notes: Height measured from average sidewalk elevation

permits_can_be_applied_via.source_quote: Sign permits can be applied for online or at the Building Department

cost_of_permit.value: Varies based on sign type and square footage
cost_of_permit.notes: Contact Building Department for exact fee calculation

time_to_secure_permit.source_quote: Standard review time is 5-10 business days
time_to_secure_permit.notes: Expedited review available for additional fee

variances_allowed.source_quote: Variances may be granted by the Board of Adjustment
